description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Pilot a toy submarine around the ocean collecting letter and number bubbles!  Over 60 levels that concentrate on the alphabet and numbers, with short levels that are meant to be easy, while the longer levels offer more of a challenge.  More games in the series coming soon!
